data.message: People sayin he got soft? No he got older, he grew wiser. What does it do the industry to destroy drake? Hes one of the highest grossing hip hop artists out there right now. This aint what em is in hip hop for and it aint why he got in it. (Toy soldiers quote)... so chill, He knows what He can do, and he chose mercy and restraint.

replies.message: Nah he got sober mate lol
